bibl.title: A Petition from Priests to Hadrian with his Subscription.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: Lukaszewicz, Adam

bibl.note: Petition from the priests of the God Soxis. Unknown provenance, probably Karanis. - This paper is intended as a preliminary presentation of the text which will be published in a future volume of the B.G.U.
Lukaszewicz Adam, A Petition from Priests to Hadrian with his Subscription.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 357-361, 1 fig.
